workflow-metadata.description:
You can easily download and run the workflow directly in your KNIME installation. We recommend that you use the latest version of the KNIME Analytics Platform for optimal performance.
In order to run the workflow you need an OpenAI API key. If you don't have one yet, register with OpenAI and create a new API key at https://platform.openai.com/account/api-keys
Please keep in mind that OpenAI will deprecate models on a regular basis. For more information about available models visit: https://platform.openai.com/docs/models
For information about the cost of using OpenAI models visit https://openai.com/pricing
